Edit.Name: prpAppGaugeVarioSpeedToFly
Edit.Caption: Speed arrows
Edit.Help: Whether to show speed command arrows on the vario gauge. When shown, in cruise mode, arrows point up to command slow down; arrows point down to command speed up.

Edit.Name: prpAppGaugeVarioAvgText
Edit.Caption: Show average
Edit.Help: Whether to show the average climb rate. In cruise mode, this switches to showing the average netto airmass rate.

Edit.Name: prpAppGaugeVarioMc
Edit.Caption: Show MacReady
Edit.Help: Whether to show the MacCready setting.

Edit.Name: prpAppGaugeVarioBugs
Edit.Caption: Show bugs
Edit.Help: Whether to show the bugs percentage.

Edit.Name: prpAppGaugeVarioBallast
Edit.Caption: Show ballast
Edit.Help: Whether to show the ballast percentage.

Edit.Name: prpAppGaugeVarioGross
Edit.Caption: Show gross
Edit.Help: Whether to show the gross climb rate.

Edit.Name: prpAppAveNeedle
Edit.Caption: Averager needle
Edit.Help: If true, the vario gauge will display a hollow averager needle. During cruise, this needle displays the average netto value. During circling, this needle displays the average gross value.
